heading: 1. Dedicated Storefronts
dis: Verified NGOs get their own digital space to list products, tell their stories, and manage inventory with zero listing fees.

heading: 2. Global Reach
dis: We connect these local listings to a worldwide audience of conscious buyers looking for authentic, ethical products.

heading: 3.Direct Impact
dis: Proceeds go directly to the NGO bank accounts, funding education, healthcare, and raw materials for the next cycle materials for the next cycle..
